name: OR_IMP_ACCESSORIES
description: This table stores information about implant accessories.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMP_ACCESSORY_EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the expiration date for the implant accessory item.

columns.name: IMP_ACCESSORY_TRACKING_NUMBER
columns.description: This column stores the tracking number for the implant accessory item.

columns.name: IMP_ACCESSORY_LOT_NUMBER
columns.description: This item stores the lot number for the implant accessory item that is being documented.

columns.name: IMP_ACCESSORY_SERIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: This item stores the serial number for the implant accessory item that is being documented.

columns.name: IMP_ACCESSORY_RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date that the implant accessory item has been received by the patient.
